name: House of Hope Ministry
description: House of Hope Kentucky provides transitional housing and comprehensive support for single, homeless women in substance abuse recovery. The program offers a two-year residential experience with individual goal development, personal mentoring, and life skills training to help women become independent and self-sufficient. Upon graduation, permanent housing assistance is provided to ease transition back to mainstream living.
source: Verified from official website, Facebook page, and multiple online directories
eligibility_requirements: Single, homeless women over age 18 who have completed a treatment program for substance abuse
populations_served: Single homeless women in substance abuse recovery
cost_information: Contact for specific cost information and available assistance
